thread.title: Weird reason people want Geoffrey Cox to be next Brexit secretary - Devon Live

author: Neil Shaw
title: Weird reason people want Geoffrey Cox to be next Brexit secretary - Devon Live
text:
Weird reason people want Geoffrey Cox to be next Brexit secretary The Devon MP is a legal heavyweight - but it isn't his mind people admire Share Neil Shaw Head of Digital, live and trending for PlymouthLive, DevonLive and CornwallLive 14:04, 16 NOV 2018
People are calling for Devon MP and Attorney General Geoffrey Cox to be the next Brexit Secretary, but it isn't his legal knowledge and experience they are admiring.
The MP for Torridge and West Devon has been tipped to fill the role vacated by Dominic Raab, who quit after Theresa May published her Brexit withdrawal document.
If Cox, Parliament's highest paid MP thanks to his day job as a barrister, gets the job he will be the third Brexit Secretary. David Davies quit earlier this year. Read More Who is Geoffrey Cox?
But while his vast experience as Attorney General and as a barrister dealing in international law make him uniquely qualified - it isn't that which people like.
It isn't even his Brexiteer credentials, or his loyalty to the Prime Minister - whom he introduced at this year's Conservative Party Conference.
It is his voice - which people on Twitter are comparing to Brian Blessed or Mufasa - the Lion King played by James Earl Jones.
So if Geoffrey Cox does replace Dominic Raab it will be The Circle of Life. I just can't wait to be king. Like us on Facebook
